label: decoration - general
tip: General metadata for a single decoration.

label: decoration - elements
tip: The list of a decoration's elements.

label: decoration - editing an element: general
tip: The first element of the list is being edited below it. Each element has 3 sections: general, typologies, and description. The general section shown here has general metadata about the element. The element's type, displayed with a gray shading, modifies the element's UI according to its value.

label: decoration - editing an element: typologies
tip: The first element of the list is being edited below it. Each element has 3 sections: general, typologies, and description. The typologies section shown here has a subject, a set of flags, and other properties selected according to the element's type.

label: decoration - editing an element: description
tip: The first element of the list is being edited below it. Each element has 3 sections: general, typologies, and description. The description section shown here has some type-independent properties, like the textual description, image ID, and optional note.
